---
title: "Professional Viz 1"
---

```{r}

library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}

penguins_clean <- penguins %>% 
  filter(!is.na(sex)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(bill_length_mm)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(body_mass_g))
  

ggplot(penguins_clean, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = sex)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6, size = 3) +
  facet_wrap(~ species) +
  labs(
    title = "Sex Differences in Penguin Body Size and Bill Length",
    subtitle = "Across three penguin species from 3 islands in the Palmer Archipelago, Antarctica",
    x = "Bill Length (mm)",
    y = "Body Mass (g)",
    color = "Sex"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 11) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 9),
    legend.position = "bottom",
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  ) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("hotpink", "steelblue"))
```
